about: Implement search and filtering for activities by category, time, and other criteria
title: "Feature: Activity Search and Filtering"
labels: enhancement
assignees: ''
---

## Description
Add search and filtering capabilities to help students discover activities that match their interests, schedule, and preferences.

## New Features
- Search by activity name or keyword
- Filter by category (sports, arts, academics, etc.)
- Filter by time/schedule
- Filter by max participants available
- Save favorite activities

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Search functionality working across activity database
- [ ] All filter options functional
- [ ] Search results are accurate and relevant
- [ ] Filters can be combined
- [ ] Favorites feature working
